item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: ORCL (Oracle Corporation) Mega Oracle shows strong performance in various areas, but investors should be cautious about short-term uncertainties and monitor upcoming earnings reports. TME (Tencent Music Entertainment Group) Middle Tencent Music Entertainment Group shows potential for growth and value creation, but there are risks associated with regulatory environment and management changes.
